remarks: Lemma 3 for ~ lindslinindsimp2 .  (Contributed by AV, 25-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
lindslinind.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
lindslinind.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
lindslinind.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
lindslinind.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) $.
lindslinind.y $e |- Y = ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( f ` x ) ) $.
lindslinind.g $e |- G = ( f |` ( S \ { x } ) ) $.
lindslinindimp2lem3 $p |- ( ( ( S e. V /\ M e. LMod ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ x e. S ) /\ ( f e. ( B ^m S ) /\ f finSupp .0. ) ) -> G finSupp .0. ) $.
$d .0. f x $.
$d B f $.
$d M f $.

$d S f x $.
